excerpt: "When translating the English phrase “How are you?” to Spanish, would you prefer to use “&iquest;C&oacute;mo est&aacute;s?” or “&iquest;C&oacute;mo est&aacute; usted?” instead? Amazon Translate is a neural machine translation service that delivers fast, high-quality, and affordable language translation."
